Don't miss our latest events, updates and workshops at Chalhoub University! 
 <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=2bb8b79845&e=0385dbee45> 	
	

TAKE THE #GenAIChallenge!

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/273c2880-ca3a-3c1e-28e6-c05382fb2403.png> 	
Discover how GEN AI is revolutionising the workplace through the insights of Olivier Gastinel. Watch his testimonial and explore the power of AI-driven learning!

With an 85% completion rate, we celebrate those who have completed the programme—thank you for embracing the future of AI!

Watch now! <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=2846086620&e=0385dbee45>  	
	

IE UNIVERSITY PARTNERSHIP WITH Chalhoub Group!

With an 85% completion rate, we celebrate those who have completed the programme—thank you for embracing the future of AI!

Watch now! <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=2846086620&e=0385dbee45>  	
	

IE UNIVERSITY PARTNERSHIP WITH Chalhoub Group! 

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/5d413ee3-9757-991a-7cbe-58848d147bdc.png> 	
We are excited to announce our partnership with IE Business School from 2025 to 2027, offering Chalhoub team members a 25% discount on Executive Education programs in areas like marketing, finance, leadership, and digital transformation. IE University provides flexible learning options, including on-campus and blended formats for working professionals. 	
Explore now! <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=b647925717&e=0385dbee45>  	
	

LEADING TEAMS MODULE 1


The Leadership Academy has launched Module 1: Leading Self, aimed at helping leaders grow in their mindset, adaptability, and self-leadership. Grounded in vertical development theory, this module encourages a shift from fixed to growth-oriented thinking, fostering innovation and personal growth. It’s designed to empower leaders to reach their full potential, both personally and professionally.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/6a6d66af-90c0-4074-7625-368536b9897d.jpg> 	
	

SKINCARE MASTERCLASS

The Leadership Academy has launched Module 1: Leading Self, aimed at helping leaders grow in their mindset, adaptability, and self-leadership. Grounded in vertical development theory, this module encourages a shift from fixed to growth-oriented thinking, fostering innovation and personal growth. It’s designed to empower leaders to reach their full potential, both personally and professionally.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/6a6d66af-90c0-4074-7625-368536b9897d.jpg> 	
	

SKINCARE MASTERCLASS


We hosted an exclusive Skincare Masterclass with Dr. Raquel Fernandez de Castro, Doctor of Aesthetic Medicine. With 25 engaged attendees, the session offered expert insights on active ingredients, aesthetic procedures, and skin health keeping our teams at the forefront of beauty education.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/b12fb2c5-b39a-40fe-edcc-f998929bf589.jpeg> 	
	

THE MOMENTUM HOUR IS HERE


We had the pleasure of joining The Momentum Hour, a dedicated time each month for Accounting, Finance & Treasury, and Procurement teams to focus on learning and growth. During the session, we have explored the Learning Pathways tailored to these Job Families and how the team can unlock new development opportunities and reach their learning target for 2025.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/b62bc944-19b9-d383-8d19-a0ea569c0443.jpg> 	
	

STORE VISITS TO LEVEL SHOES AND TRYANO

We had the pleasure of joining The Momentum Hour, a dedicated time each month for Accounting, Finance & Treasury, and Procurement teams to focus on learning and growth. During the session, we have explored the Learning Pathways tailored to these Job Families and how the team can unlock new development opportunities and reach their learning target for 2025.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/b62bc944-19b9-d383-8d19-a0ea569c0443.jpg> 	
	

STORE VISITS TO LEVEL SHOES AND TRYANO


Over two inspiring days at Level Shoes and Tryano, the team connected with store teams and leadership to gain valuable insights into their experiences. The visit included support for Gen AI training, observations of customer interactions, and discussions on future collaboration opportunities. A big thank you to both teams for their warm hospitality, we look forward to strengthening our partnership.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/7c22e998-7cb0-a3b1-3342-791c5e811275.jpg> 	
	

BEYOND BEAUTY BANGALORE


We recently embarked on an exciting journey to Bangalore, where we delivered two specially curated training programmes tailored for the vibrant Indian beauty market. Over the course of four dynamic days, we covered everything from skincare fundamentals to the latest in makeup and fragrance trends, empowering over 70 passionate Beauty Consultants with enhanced knowledge and skills.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/82aae285-9a73-e59d-2339-8811a202a0a8.jpg> 	
	

BOOST YOUR SKILLS WITH Udemy!

Over the course of four dynamic days, we covered everything from skincare fundamentals to the latest in makeup and fragrance trends, empowering over 70 passionate Beauty Consultants with enhanced knowledge and skills.

Congratulations to Raed Hamed, our Udemy Star of the Month! Raed dedicated over 60 hours to learning on Udemy in March2025 an inspiring commitment to growth. Ready to take charge of your development?
